 Destructor.

Detailed Description

A BubbleSortProvider is used to sort rows of a child provider with the bubble sort algorithm.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef SortProvider BubbleSortProvider::Base
 

Reimplemented from SortProvider.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

BubbleSortProvider::BubbleSortProvider (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

BubbleSortProvider::BubbleSortProvider (  Provider *  provider,
INT  columnid = 0,
BOOLEAN  order = TRUE
) 
 

On construction the following parameters have to be specified: provider: The provider which should be sorted. columnid: Specify which columnid has to be sorted. order: Specify whether ascending (TRUE) or descending (FALSE).

Destructor.
